name: Quick Run
description:
My first ever game that uses randomizing functions. Created it in 2 hours 10 minutes. I was just bored so I created it. I hope you enjoy playing it.

Controls:

Right arrow key to go right.

Left arrow key to go left.

Current Version is 0.8 while the one you are playing is 0.7! For the latest version, visit http://nafees.avonhost.com Also, the screenshots are of version 0.2! These screenshots are nothing as compared to the game.
